name: Abathor - Atlantis Landing
description:
Atlantis is being razed! Demon hordes have burst through dimensional gates to destroy the entire continent. The last Atlantean refugees have been devoured by a sea abomination as they boarded their ships to flee the massacre. In this game excerpt, the monsters appear to be led by a mysterious enemy: cunning General Kipak.



What is happening in the once mighty Atlantis? The heroes land on a dangerous beach, each with a powerful reason for being there...




Relive the glory of arcades in this action platformer for up to 4 players. This game excerpt contains:


  • 5 distinct levels of increasing difficulty (from the more than 50 stages that the complete game will have), riddled with enemies, traps and challenges.
  • The beginning of Abathor's story. You will start to sense what is happening on the Atlantis continent and how to deal with the threat.
  • A combat against the sea abomination that has devoured the fleeing Atlanteans.
  • A pixel-perfect art design, beautiful and detailed, and epic musical compositions.
